parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided text.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly refers to the Partidul Social Democrat (PSD), a political party participating in the parliamentary elections. While it doesn't mention a specific candidate by name, it promotes a policy initiative proposed by the PSD government.  This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, targeting a broad audience in Alba County, Romania.  It aims to reach a wide population, not just individuals. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The post highlights a policy initiative aimed at benefiting senior citizens, a key demographic in elections.  The clear intention is to present the PSD in a positive light and potentially influence voters to support them in the elections. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. While the post presents information about a government proposal, it lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic reporting. It's promotional in nature, focusing on the positive aspects of the PSD's initiative without presenting counterarguments or alternative perspectives.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post doesn't express a personal opinion; instead, it promotes a specific political party's policy. The language used is promotional and aims to garner support for the PSD.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1775434133288283</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by Media Smart SRL on behalf of PSD Alba, promotes a policy initiative of the Partidul Social Democrat (PSD).  While not explicitly urging voters to vote for a specific candidate, the post's clear objective is to favorably portray the PSD and influence voters positively. The targeting of senior citizens in Alba County, coupled with the promotional language and lack of journalistic objectivity, strongly suggests an intention to influence the election outcome. The post fulfills all criteria of electoral propaganda as defined in Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006.  The timing of the post, after the official end of the electoral campaign, further strengthens the case for a violation.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Partidul Social Democrat (PSD)</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PSD</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Media Smart SRL, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări plătite pe Facebook (ID: 1775434133288283) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează o inițiativă a Partidului Social Democrat (PSD) fără neutralitate jurnalistică, având ca efect electoral influențarea pozitivă a voturilor pentru PSD. Postarea, cu un buget de sub 100 RON, a atins între 1000 și 2000 de impresii, vizând seniorii din județul Alba.  Textul postării, care evidențiază beneficii pentru pensionari datorită unei măsuri guvernamentale PSD, constituie propagandă electorală, încălcând prevederile legale privind perioada de campanie electorală.  Contact: ofice@mediasmartsro.ro, +40752099270, https://www.mediasmartsro.ro/.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
